hero.title: From Board Games to Team Building
hero.subtitle: Where board games turn into innovative ideas. Play together, build together, grow together.

feature1.title: Custom Board Games
feature1.description: To strengthen the necessary abilities for team building and competition in the startup world

feature2.title: Networking
feature2.description: Opportunity to meet top students and startup enthusiasts and build a team

feature3.title: Business Concepts Education
feature3.description: Presenting content related to startups and transferring experience

benefit1.headline: You'll Play, But Strategically
benefit1.paragraph: At Hambazi Event, every move you make is the result of thought and planning. Our board games are designed to strengthen your strategic thinking and decision-making skills. This isn't just entertainmentâ€”it's learning strategic thinking.
benefit1.bullet1: Board games designed to enhance strategic thinking
benefit1.bullet2: Opportunity to practice decision-making in a safe, controlled environment

benefit2.headline: You Gain Experience, But Real Experience
benefit2.paragraph: The experience you gain at Hambazi Event isn't just theoretical. You face real challenges in a real environment that are directly applicable to the startup and business world. Every experience is a step toward your professional success.
benefit2.bullet1: Working with real challenges from the startup world
benefit2.bullet2: Practical experience in team building and project management

benefit3.headline: You See Education, But Practical Education
benefit3.paragraph: Education at Hambazi Event is practical and hands-on. You learn concepts not through books, but through direct experience. Each session is an opportunity to learn skills that are immediately applicable.
benefit3.bullet1: Learning through doing and direct experience
benefit3.bullet3: Mentorship and guidance from industry experts

benefit4.headline: You Find Friends, But Professional Friends
benefit4.paragraph: At Hambazi Event, you meet people who are not only good friends but also potential professional colleagues and partners. Networking here means building lasting and meaningful relationships.
benefit4.bullet1: Meeting top students and young talents
benefit4.bullet2: Building a professional network of lasting relationships
benefit4.bullet3: Opportunity to collaborate and build teams with like-minded individuals
benefit4.bullet4: Access to a community of entrepreneurs and innovators

testimonial1.review: webtics delivers powerful insights that turn complex data into actionable decisions
